short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search by Keyword from Videos in TikTok

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features: 
- Easily search for TikTok videos using keywords.
- Search within any user's favorites, liked, collections, reposts, and posts.
- You also have the option to filter videos by specifying a custom date range for their posting dates.

Notes:
- After installing the extension, please refresh tiktok.com.
- Make sure you are logged in to view your own favorites, liked, etc.
- Currently, the extension searches through each video's description, creator, and sound only. Future releases may incorporate the video transcript or cover image!
 
For any issues or questions, submit an issue on Github:
https://github.com/cathzhou/tiktok-keyword-searcher
